verbs.description: North Korea [V: is] expected to pay as little as possible for the Trump - Kim summit .
[ARG1: North] Korea is [V: expected] [C-ARG1: to pay as little as possible for the Trump - Kim summit] .
[ARG0: North Korea] is expected to [V: pay] [ARG1: as little as possible] [ARG3: for the Trump - Kim summit] .
